My name is Roy Naraine. I’m a medical doctor and an Award Winning Udemy Instructor with over 20 years of experience in self-improvement training. During this time I have had the opportunity to tutor and mentor an eclectic mix of corporate workers, managers, directors and businessmen.

One of the most frequent questions they have been asking me is, “Roy, is there a way to detect whether someone is lying to me?” The answer is yes. By possessing and understanding the fundamental knowledge of body language and human psychology you can and will be able to spot a liar. It doesn’t matter if the liar is a family member, an employee or your boss. By using the tools I will provide you in this course, you will catch them all red handed.

Remember, you do not have to take my words for granted. In all our productions we always include a number of free, preview videos. Watch them and confirm that the power of lie detection is the tool you need.

Enroll now and see why thousands of students have trusted our content.
